name: VS Brutus Friday Night Funkin'
description:
GF wants a puppy so you go to Brutus's Pet Shelter to adopt one. Just don't get to caught up in rapping! Now what are you waiting for... PLAY IT NOW! Thanks!

Made By: BrutusDev/DreamcastNick

Original Game By:Ninjamuffin99, PhantomArcade, kawaisprite, and evilsk8r
